error.cannot-get-app-config: Unable to retrieve app setting information.
error.common-error-message:
The program is busy.
Please try again.
error.filter-result-is-over-limit:
Filter results exceed 10,000 and cannot be displayed. 
 Please add to or change the filter condition.
error.file-upload-failed:
File Upload Failed
Please reload your browser and try again.
error.exceed-search-result-limit:
'There are too many search results. Please try entering a keyword and then clicking the Lookup button. If this does not solve the problem, please contact the system administrator with the following information.
【For system administrators】
The process has timed out. Please change the lookup settings to reduce the number of candidate records for lookup.
error.no-permission: You do not have the necessary permissions.
error.enter-valid-email-address: Please enter a valid email address.
error.enter-valid-url: Please enter a valid URL. The URL should start with 'http://' or 'https://'.
error.posted-message:
{{username}} posted a message on this page.
{{content}}
error.limit-exceeded: The maximum number of authentication attempts has been reached. Please contact the administrator.
error.username-exists: This login name is already being used by another user.
error.invalid-password: Passwords must be at least 6 alphanumeric characters including a combination of uppercase and lowercase letters and numbers.
error.target-list-view-not-found:
The specified list view is currently unavailable. 
To enable it, please register the appropriate list view in the plugin settings page.
error.wrong-username-password: The login name or password is incorrect.
error.cannot-use-register: You do not have permission to use this feature.
error.not-include-space-in-login-name: The login name cannot contain spaces.
error.please-enter-password-by-hankaku: Please enter a password with single-byte alphanumeric characters.
error.password-not-match: The passwords do not match. Please confirm that the re-typed password is correct.
error.exceed-user-limit: The number of Chobiit users has exceeded the limit.

info.is-it-ok-to-delete: Are you sure you want to delete this record?
info.filter-operator.not-contain: Does not include any of the following
info.get-referenced-data: The data has been successfully retrieved.
info.data-not-exist: There is no record to reference.
info.save-warning-message:
If a third party logs into this system with the same terminal and browser while temporarily saved contents remain
the temporarily saved contents can be viewed.
* The temporarily saved contents will be cleared when 'Save' is performed after temporarily saving.
info.login-description: Please enter your login name and password.
info.register-email-description: Enter an email address to be used for authentication and notification.
info.register-for-already-registered: Already have an account? Click here to log in.
info.forgot-password-enter-login-name: Please enter your registered login name.
info.forgot-password-label: An authentication code will be sent to the registered email address.
info.forgot-password-please-enter-login-name: Please enter your registered login name.
info.forgot-password-not-found-login-name: The entered login name was not found. Please confirm that the login name is correct.
info.forgot-password-please-enter-password-by: Please enter a password with single-byte alphanumeric characters.
info.forgot-password-password-not-match: The passwords do not match. Please confirm that the re-typed password is correct.
